unicef-wee3.def: Whether the law provides for 14 weeks or more of paid maternity leave in accordance with the International Labour Organization standards.
unicef-wee3.name: Maternity leave benefits
unicef-wee3.source: World Bank Women Business and the Law. Last update: February 2021.
